name: Son of Robin
description:
This is an early access, unfinished version of the game.

Son of Robin is a 2D survival game, taking place on a deserted island.
Made in C#, using MonoGame framework.

  • procedurally generated island
  • living flora and fauna (plants growing, animals eating and breeding, etc.)
  • day-and-night cycle
  • multiple characters with different abilities / stats
  • tools and weapons
  • crafting
  • cooking
  • potion making
  • treasure hunting
  • keybord / mouse support
  • gamepad support
  • configurable controls

Currently, the game can be played (and enjoyed), but is missing the end goal.

Mac OS X version is untested.

Come to our Discord server and join the game community!


Graphics is made mostly of free RPGMaker / OpenGameArt assets. The graphics assets will be replaced will custom made ones.

SFX: https://freesound.org/
